programme.desc: The staff at St George's A&E in south-west London tend to 59-year-old Debby, who cut her hand on her lawnmower while distracted by thoughts of her son's forthcoming wedding. Also visiting the emergency room is 70-year-old George, whose eye has been impaled by a piece of driftwood, after he fell while bailing rainwater from his boat moored on the Thames. Plus, eight-year-old Phoebe arrives after accidentally sitting on a pair of scissors she left on a chair - getting them stuck in her thigh

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 61-year-old woman is airlifted to hospital after a car mounted the pavement and ran her over and doctors quickly get her into the CT scanner to ascertain the full extent of her injuries. programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty visits Germany to learn the secret behind potato crisps, while Helen Lawal investigates whether carb-restrictive diets really burn fat quicker, and uncovers an eye-opening medical use for this popular weight-loss tool. Plus, Matt Tebbutt finds out the surprising reason why smoked fish is dyed yellow

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Yianni: Supercar Customiser
programme.desc: Yianni's latest client is transforming her life and ticking goals off on her bucket list. First was a fitness regime, second a full back tattoo and now comes the third task - she wants to turn her dull, green Range Rover into a sparkling red sensation that matches the bikini she wears when doing bodybuilding competitions

programme.title: Yianni: Supercar Customiser
programme.desc: This episode focuses on two cars and two very different social media stars, each with over a million subscribers. The first is a high-performance Mercedes E class coupe, which gets a unique red camouflage wrap. The other is a supercar with vandalised vinyl which needs stripping. Yianni wrapped Deji's Lamborghini Huracan a few months back, and the car has had paint splattered all over the bonnet. Will the wrap have saved the paintwork beneath, or will the 'haters' win?

programme.title: Cops on the Rock
programme.desc: Customs officers come across a suspicious boat, far out at sea at night, which they think is part of a smuggling operation that is refuelling the criminals' speedboats

programme.title: Special Ops: Crime Squad UK
programme.desc: Special police task forces tackle a brutal stabbing of a 16-year-old boy in Preston two days before Christmas, and Northamptonshire police target a drug-dealing gang on an estate

programme.title: Australian Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Further action from Down Under's take on the world's trickiest obstacle course. More of the best Ninjas from the heats return to tackle the second semi-final, but who will succeed?

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France
programme.desc: The chef continues his 'journey without maps', leaving the main routes and tourist hotspots behind to embark on a personal road trip along picturesque and remote backroads. Here, he heads through France's eastern border regions of Alsace and Jura - famous for Comte cheese and home to his favourite French dish of choucroute garni. He then begins to head inland, visiting Burgundy for a memorable glass of Auxey-Duresses wine, and sampling oeuf en meurette with a difference. Following a memorable Sunday lunch near the French/Swiss border, he is inspired to recreate a traditional blueberry tart

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series. New South Wales police are summoned to an assault in a bakery, and Victoria police execute a search warrant on a house suspected of growing marijuana.

programme.title: Special Ops: Crime Squad UK
programme.desc: Britain's most talented detectives pursue a violent drug gang in Gloucester, an aggressive mugger in sleepy Kent, and a gang of men stealing Britain's history in Cheshire

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Chris Harris, Freddie Flintoff and Paddy McGuinness get to grips with a disused hearse, and give it a new lease of life as the ultimate family car. On the track, Chris puts the Dallara Stradale through its paces, while royal couple Zara and Mike Tindall go head-to-head in Star in a Reasonably Fast Car

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness and Freddie Flintoff go on a jungle adventure in Borneo with the Gurkhas, in a pair of rare but very cheap old cars. Back in the studio, Chris Harris gets behind the wheel of the world's most luxurious SUV, and the gang is joined by Bob Mortimer

programme.title: Australian Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Another batch of Down Under's finest Ninjas from the heats take on the world's trickiest obstacle course in the third semi-final, but who will make it to the Grand Final this time?

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick meets chef Tom Adams, who runs Combeshead Farm, a leading field-to-fork restaurant where they grow and produce all of their own food, from sourdough bread to pork pies, as well as rearing a small herd of Mangalitsa pigs, a hairy, old-world breed that produces exquisite hams. Rick tries out a new recipe - pork chops with a sloe berry sauce - before moving on to the village of Rock, where his son Jack holds a clam bake on the shore of the Camel Estuary

programme.title: Taskmaster

programme.desc: It's the fourth semi-final, and Australia's favourite tradesman Sam Goodall leads the charge as the remaining Ninja Warriors fight for the last eight places in the Grand Final

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick meets his good friend, the actor and comedian Barry Humphries, who fell in love with Cornwall in the 1960s when he escaped London to develop his famous character Dame Edna Everage. Barry talks about his friendship with British poet John Betjeman, and asks Rick to review his home-made fishcakes. Rick also goes fishing for crab, before cooking a simple yet delicious crab omelette. The host then takes a dip in the chilly north Atlantic with an eccentric group of wild water swimmers called the Perranporth Blue Tits

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Celebrities undertake journeys on some of the most perilous routes in the world. In Alaska, Sue Perkins and Charley Boorman drive along the notorious Dalton Highway, a dirt track originally constructed in the 1970s as a supply road for the Trans-Alaska oil pipeline. The pair struggle to cope with the Arctic conditions and constant threat of avalanches, but receive help from experienced truckers who teach them some unwritten rules for surviving the road's many hazards

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert and Greg Davies negotiate a variety of unusual hazards as they travel through Nepal, a country with one of the world's highest rates of road traffic accidents. Frequent floods and landslides mean car journeys are often fraught with danger, and matters are not helped by the varied states of Nepalese roads, which range from urban highways to crumbling mountain passes

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Ben Fogle and Hugh Dennis undertake a perilous journey through the Peruvian Andes. Their route takes in 2,000ft drops, one-lane dirt roads, remote mountain trails and muddy, humid jungle terrain, as they search for the lost city of Constitucion, once destined to be the capital of Peru

programme.title: Australian Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Only the fittest and the fastest Ninja Warriors will survive as they take to the Grand Final course and race against the clock

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick journeys inland from the majestic Camel Estuary to one of Britain's finest vineyards, where he joins in harvesting the grapes to discover that the Cornish weather is perfect making some of the best wine in the country. Just off Pentire Point, as the sun sets, Rick rides the gentle swell of the north Atlantic with an old friend, casting his line to hook Britain's fastest fish, before firing up the barbecue to cook his catch with a recipe inspired from a trip to Goa. Rick joins Tim Smit, best known for starting the hugely successful Eden Project, who reveals to Rick his new and ambitious idea in Cornwall

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: The next part of Michael Portillo's journey from Southampton to Wolverhampton begins in Wokingham, Berkshire, where the former politician finds out how demand from a growing number of rail commuters fuelled the development of the modern printing press. He then learns about a Tudor businessman who manufactured cloth in enormous volumes in Newbury, and ends this leg of his trip in Bradford on Avon, Wiltshire. Here, a local manufacturer describes how his Victorian forebears were the first in Britain to be licensed to vulcanise rubber

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the next stage of his journey to Wolverhampton, Michael Portillo visits Lacock Abbey near Chippenham in Wiltshire to find out how the world's first photographic negative was made. He then heads to Bristol Zoo, examines an extraordinary piece of Victorian engineering at Severn Tunnel Junction and ends the leg in Gloucester, where he meets a stonemason at the city's cathedral

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo ends his journey across the Republic of Ireland and Northern Ireland by walking across the Carrick-a-Rede rope bridge in Co Antrim. He then follows in the footsteps of the Victorians at Giant's Causeway, and explores the history of Londonderry

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on another journey around the nation with a copy of George Bradshaw's Victorian Railway Guidebook to discover how the railways have affected people and what remains of Bradshaw's Britain. He begins by travelling from High Wycombe, Buckinghamshire, to Stratford-upon-Avon in Warwickshire, finding out about the remarkable craftsmen behind the Victorian furniture trade, discovering how George Bradshaw helped save Britain's canal heritage and seeing Shakespeare through the eyes of a 19th-century rail tourist

programme.desc: Derek heads to Scotland in the mother of all rainstorms to pick up a Jaguar E-type and a rare MGC convertible. Plus, Dave extracts a rare Austin Gipsey from a lock up

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Trans-Siberian Adventure
programme.desc: Joanna concludes her journey across Russia, travelling through deepest Siberia. Along the way, she visits one of the world's deepest lakes, meets an oligarch and travels to the city where the Russian royal family was killed. programme.title: Chris Tarrant: Extreme Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Chris Tarrant returns for more train journeys through some of the world's most challenging terrain. He heads to the Arctic for a trip along the Alaska Railroad, but as he arrives in the port of Seward, it's not a great start as there are no trains running, so he ends up hitching a ride with a track inspector's car. He continues his journey on a freight train heading for Anchorage, Alaska's biggest city, and finally heads north on the Aurora passenger train to the town of Healy. Along the way he checks out the tiny village of Eklutna, which has great importance for the indigenous inhabitants, and goes for an intrepid fishing trip on a thawing frozen lake

programme.title: Chris Tarrant: Extreme Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Chris travels through Argentina, starting his journey at British-built railway station in Buenos Aires and taking an overnight train to the pampas lowlands. In the major port of Bahia Blanca, Chris meets four veterans of the Falklands War and finds out what the locals now think about the British, before ending his journey by riding La Trochita, known in English as the Old Patagonian Express

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Concrete channels hidden in a mountaintop forest, a collapsing bridge, a marooned military base and the upright rusting carcass of ship

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the final leg of his journey from Southampton to the West Midlands, Michael Portillo visits the spa town of Cheltenham, where he gets behind the wheel of a very early locomotive carriage that ran on the road. In Tewkesbury, he joins a group re-enacting a battle from the Wars of the Roses, before he reaches his final destination of Wolverhampton, where he hears how Queen Victoria made an emotional visit that signalled the end of her exile from public life after mourning Prince Albert

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a journey to Chichester, with the first leg beginning in Norwich. At the city's Norman castle he uncovers the Victorian public's gory fascination with crime and punishment and finds out how campaigners such as Elizabeth Fry worked to improve conditions for prisoners. Heading west to Thetford, he explores how the Victorian appetite for rabbits and their fur led to special train services to London, and ends in the Suffolk town of Brandon, where he tries his hand at flint-knapping

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo learns how the railways helped to make Birmingham the pen-making capital of the world, hears the chilling tale of one of 19th-century Britain's most notorious murderers and samples delicacies concocted in a Victorian kitchen at Shugborough Hall, Staffordshire

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Stoke-on-Trent to Winsford, Cheshire, finding out about one of the greatest locomotive factories in railway history along the way. programme.title: Chris Tarrant: Extreme Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Chris travels through Argentina, starting his journey at British-built railway station in Buenos Aires and taking an overnight train to the pampas lowlands. In the major port of Bahia Blanca, Chris meets four veterans of the Falklands War and finds out what the locals now think about the British, before ending his journey by riding La Trochita, known in English as the Old Patagonian Express

programme.title: Chris Tarrant: Extreme Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Chris travels 1,500 miles in a journey from Cape Town in South Africa to the Victoria Falls in Zimbabwe, following a hugely ambitious railway pioneered by 19th-century British colonial politician Cecil Rhodes. He starts his trip in luxury on the Blue Train, a five-star hotel on rails that takes him to the mining town of Kimberley, where he explores the diamond mine where Rhodes made his fortune

programme.title: Chris Tarrant: Extreme Railway Journeys

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Ipswich to Chelmsford, starting at an agricultural implements works with its own railway sidings. Continuing his journey south-west into Essex, Michael dredges for oysters off Mersea Island before taking the train to Witham, where he discovers a model farming establishment at Tiptree. His final destination is Chelmsford, home to the world's first purpose-built radio equipment factory, established by Guglielmo Marconi

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the next leg of his journey, Michael Portillo heads along the Essex bank of the Thames before crossing the river into Kent. He begins in Barkingside, where Victorian philanthropist Thomas Barnardo made it his mission to transform the lives of destitute children. The former politician then tries his hand at loading a container onto a pocket wagon at Tilbury docks, and ends his trip in Rochester, where he encounters a host of familiar characters and explores a town that was an inspiration for many of Charles Dickens' works

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: Actor David Morrissey, comedian Lucy Beaumont, diver and Olympic medallist Tom Daley and radio presenter and cancer survivor Adele Roberts take on three challenges set by judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith. programme.title: My Massive C**k

programme.title: Send Nudes: Body SOS
programme.desc: Bouncer Michelle wants more bounce in her breasts, while boxer Tobie who, after losing 12 stone, still feels that his tummy is too heavyweight thanks to excess skin

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Three-legged labrador Dave seeks a new best friend, and his owners Laura and Paul hope that Luna, the beautiful but nervous saluki, will win Dave over. Nine-year-old stray westie called Norman gets much attention from mother and son Lorraine and Oliver - upsetting youngster Cynthia, a Staffie cross. Meanwhile, enthusiastic setter-poodle pup Obi might just win the chance to bring the joy and chaos that Mike and his partner Tracey don't yet know they need in their lives

programme.title: The Dog Academy
programme.desc: A crack team of Britain's top specialist trainers instructs beleaguered owners in dog management skills and dog psychology. Ferocious cockapoo Bear is driving a wedge between owners Paul and Louise. With their marriage under stress, Victoria and Adam must help tame Bear's aggressive behaviour before it's too late. Eleven-year-old Chihuahua Gina is a pocket rocket with an attitude problem. Because of her penchant for attacking other dogs, mum and son Cindy and Cory have to carry her around in a special zipped-up safety bag. It remains to be seen whether the trainers can teach an old dog new tricks

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Matt Tebbutt unbottles the mystery of wine sulphites and hangovers, Amanda Byram explores how peas could solve the plastic pollution problem, and Andi Oliver wonders how shop-bought grated cheese doesn't stick together

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Trucker Tony Houston holds the first dinner party in Clacton-on-Sea, Essex, hoping his menu of scallops on black pudding with pea puree, and sea bass with prawn mash will impress his fellow diners. However, if his food fails to live up to his expectations, he anticipates the whole ambience and presentation of the evening will secure him the 1,000 cash prize

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Anthony Street hosts the second day in Essex, and has his work cut out trying to impress the diners after displaying some unusual table manners the previous night. However, he hopes his passion for quirky entertainment will be enough to win them over

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Driving instructor Claire Kelly hosts the third dinner party in Essex. Her devil-may-care approach does nothing to dampen her confidence, and she is convinced hers will be the winning night. Even if her chaotic cooking style and haphazard evening fail to win over the guests, the mother-of-two has some special entertainment lined up to gain a few extra points

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Entrepreneur and foraging fan Richard Harris hosts the fourth night of the competition in the Clacton-on-Sea area of Essex. Not everybody is impressed when they discover he has had help, and Claire Kelly accuses him of being a food snob. However, he hopes a performance by the local church choir will help improve the atmosphere

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Teacher Kerrie Brinkley-Whittington hosts the final dinner party in Essex, and uses a few props to help her night go with a swing. However, she is soon under fire from entrepreneur Richard, who is not amused to be asked to contribute more to group conversations, and when trucker Tony makes an emergency run to the garden, it looks as if the rhubarb dessert could be just as controversial. At the end of the evening, the winner is announced

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: A few years ago,had a holiday romance on Fuerteventura. It didn't last, but her love for the island did. Now Marie has decided the island would be the perfect place for her and her eight-year-old son to spend quality time together in the school holidays. programme.title: A Place in the Sun

With the help of property expert Laura Hamilton and a budget of 115,000, they are hoping to find somewhere that they and their family can enjoy for years to come

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A Northamptonshire couple head for the Italian hills to start a new company. A villa in Spain opens for business and there is a change in fortune for a yoga teacher in Portugal

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In the West Midlands, the first host, company director Sue, promises an evening her guests will never forget. Joining her are business guru Marc, teaching assistant Kim, manager Paul and mole catcher Michael. Sue hopes to get things off to a great start, but when her starter reminds Kim of baby food and Marc of toilets, things begin to look bleak

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In the West Midlands, business guru Marc intends to use his coaching skills to plan an impressive night, but after annoying his fellow diners, he has a tough job ahead

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Teaching assistant Kim hopes to win over her guests with a summer holiday-themed evening, as she hosts the third dinner party of the week in the West Midlands

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: College manager and part-time comedian Paul is the fourth to play host in the West Midlands, turning his home into a pub in the hope of pulling in the points by pulling a few pints

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is the last night in the West Midlands, and mole-catcher Michael intends to impress his guests with his night of fancy French cuisine, including a controversial main course

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sisters Pamela and Sheila look for their dream holiday home near Oliva on Spain's Costa de Valencia. They always dreamed of buying a holiday home with their late mother, who was originally from Spain, but unfortunately, she died before they had the chance. In her memory, they're looking for a three or four-bedroom town house with traditional Spanish features for their budget of 70,000. Danni Menzies lines up five impressive properties to show them, which hopefully fulfil their needs

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Mark and Maggie have been together for 35 years and are looking for a holiday home in Barbados, where they can escape British winters and make the most of the tropical climate. With a budget of 350,000, Jasmine Harman uses her extensive knowledge of the island to find the best properties for the pair to choose between

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer guide prospective buyers in south-east London through the complex world of viewings and agents as they try to buy a home. Kirstie meets Ros and Hannah, who have lacked the confidence to go out and secure the house they have dreamed of. Meanwhile, Phil is on hand to help Emma and Karthik, who have moved from Singapore and want to find a new family home

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer look back to some of their favourite properties from the show and offers tips and tricks to help viewers make the best of their homes. As well as catching up with some of the families that previously featured, Kirstie and Phil focus on the layout issues and dilemmas that many of us now face in a very different world. In this episode, the duo tackle future-proofing, as two families at very different stages of their lives tackle tricky renovations in a last-ditch attempt to make their homes work for the long term

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud meets Kate and Rob, who have lived in a 1940s prefab house built by Rob's grandfather. Originally designed to be lived in for just 10 years, this factory-built home is well past its sell-by date. Now, Kate and Rob are at last in a position to replace it with a bespoke, modern, warm home - which will also be built in a factory using volumetric modular construction. Over just six weeks, their new house will be manufactured on a production line, complete with insulation, tiling and kitchen installation

programme.title: World War Z (2013)
programme.desc: A virus sweeps across the globe, turning everyone infected into mindless, ravenous zombies. As entire countries fall into chaos, a United Nations investigator sets off on a journey around the world to discover the cause of the pandemic and hopefully find a cure before human civilisation is brought to an end. Thriller based on the novel by Max Brooks, starring Brad Pitt and Mireille Enos

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: At Greg Davies' request, Alex Horne has split his band five ways for the sake of a task. This in turn leads to Jenny Eclair imparting her knowledge on trumpeters and piles. Kiell Smith-Bynoe composes a solo entitled Compose a Solo - and it turns out that Frankie Boyle has some pretty strong opinions on golf. Somewhere amid the madness, Ivo Graham and Mae Martin also remain in contention

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts

programme.title: 999: Emergency Call Out

programme.title: Rich Kids Go Skint

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: The doctors treat patients suffering from chronic pain, including a man who is HIV positive and also suffers from a range of other health issues. Where will it take them? Tree surgeon Rocky faces danger on a daily basis as he tends to the high branches of the Costa del Sol, while young magician Dean faces the first night of a residency at the Chamber of Secrets theatre

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: An insight into the working life of officers patrolling the nation's roads, using modern technology and old-fashioned methods to bring criminals to justice

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: At Ripley police station, officer Alex responds to news of two cars reported missing by a young woman, and the suspected thieves turn out to be two wanted men with a long list of previous convictions. Alex makes it his mission to catch the two dangerous criminals, who go on a violent rampage while on the run for four weeks. Jamie Theakston presents

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Dog handler Bob hunts down a suspected knifeman, while interceptors Jon and Chris are on the trail of some suspected armed robbers. Meanwhile, Sergeant John wrestles with a drunken reveller, and a tattoo provides a clue that leads Jim to a major drugs bust

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jenno joins the takedown of a man suspected to be armed, while Dan and Gordy hit the door of a suspected drug den. programme.title: Police Interceptors

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the deaths of a radio DJ and a naval officer who were both killed during a live broadcast, only to discover there are a number of potential suspects. Evidence leads the agents to suspect the involvement of a radical group called Military at Home, prompting Tony to investigate an upmarket gated community - where his door-to-door inquiries yield an enticing proposition or two from the female residents. American drama, starring Michael Weatherly, with Nadia Bjorlin

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Abby becomes personally involved in the case of a murdered naval scientist who she regards as a kindred spirit. The team's initial inquiries turn up little concrete information about the victim's life, but the forensic specialist makes a breakthrough when she decodes some of the mysterious markings covering the body. Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team members are surprised when Gibbs asks DiNozzo's father to join them in their investigation of a murder committed at the US Naval Academy. However, Tony Sr's experience turns out to play a vital role in the inquiry, which finds the team members hunting for a missing nuclear weapon they suspect is about to be sold on the black market. Guest starring Robert Wagner

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis uncover new evidence as they investigate a 30-year-old rape and stabbing case, but the victim is consumed with fear when confronted with the possibility of another trial for the perpetrator

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The death of a show-horse leads the team to investigate a woman's disappearance, and the subsequent trial brings to light a possible insurance scam and a sting operation

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A case is reopened after five years when a copycat killer begins claiming victims, but investigations become complicated when one of McCoy's old assistants accuses him of forging evidence that helped put an innocent man behind bars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman's body is found in a lift, and McCoy finds his prosecution of the prime suspect hampered by a vindictive judge Ross offended in court

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A student is found stabbed to death in his flat, and a college friend is soon named prime suspect - but she claims the victim was a stranger who used a date rape drug on her. However, it soon emerges that the crime could have been racially motivated. Drama, with Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the murder of a rare coin dealer, focusing their efforts on a millionaire who seems the most likely culprit - but Ross finds himself forced to play detective too. Sam Waterson and Jerry Orbach star

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy lieutenant is found dead in the Pentagon's custodial closet, and surveillance footage indicates she was killed by a co-worker. However, Ziva and the team discover her supposed assailant actually died of a heart attack days before the crime was committed. Meanwhile, suspicions are raised regarding the eyeball left in Tony's drink, and the investigators' attention is fixed on the port-to-port murderer, who appears to still be at large

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony's one-time Baltimore PD partner Danny Price is murdered in a manner that suggests the port-to-port killer has struck again. However, a key difference in the way the victim was bound suggests the crime was actually the work of a copycat, forcing the investigators to consider whether Price had any enemies

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: New evidence reveals the serial killer has infiltrated the agency and is targeting a member of the NCIS team, prompting Gibbs to seek the guidance of his former mentor Mike Franks. A lead from Barrett's squad reveals the CIA has also been tracking the murderer - and its findings suggest the culprit could be an even deadlier foe than anticipated

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part story, Prentiss's connection with Doyle is revealed as she finds herself the main target in a revenge mission. The worried policewoman finds it difficult to conceal the truth about her troubled past, while her colleagues try to halt the criminal's killing spree

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Part two of two. Prentiss's colleagues finally realise her connection to the murderous Ian Doyle, resulting in a dangerous mission that puts everyone's lives at risk as they encounter Irish mobster Fahey and a corrupt former ally. Drama, starring Paget Brewster

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Novak tries to track down Benson, whose testimony is vital to the successful outcome of a rape prosecution - but she is living under the assumed identity of a green activist and has infiltrated a group suspected of being eco-terrorists. Arrested during a confrontation with police, she is questioned over her fellow members' suspected involvement in a murder, and sets out to prove their innocence. Drama, starring Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A distinctive tattoo on the body of a dead teenage girl leads Stabler and Beck to a foster home - which proves to be a cover for a child-prostitution ring. Learning the victim was one of several girls working for a pimp named Victor, the pair set about convincing the others to testify against him. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin's son Ken is caught trying to dig up a body at night, and arrested on suspicion of murder. At the police station he is found to have been covering for his cousin. However, the guilty party later uses a technicality to have his confession ruled inadmissible. Guest starring Chris 'Ludacris' Bridges and Ernest Waddell

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Green and Cassady try to solve the murder of a Muslim man at the hands of a white supremacist group, following a trail of clues that leads to the victim's cousin, who is seemingly connected to a terrorist cell operating in New York. With little evidence to go on, the detectives struggle to find enough information to close the case and stop a potential attack in the city. Crime drama, starring Jesse L Martin and Milena Govich

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Two elderly people, both under the care of the same visiting nurse, die almost simultaneously and Jessica is asked to get to the bottom of the mystery. Angela Lansbury stars, with William Windom and Audra Lindley

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. In Hammersmith, west London, camera operators help police as they try to enforce a drinking ban on a local park and spot a group whose members may be about to break into a shop

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. Ziva confronts her past when the team is ordered to protect her father, Mossad director Eli David, at a gathering of former heads of NCIS. The agents discover he is being targeted by terrorists who have hijacked a shipment of advanced weapons from the army. Drama, guest starring TJ Ramini and Michael Nouri, with Cote de Pablo and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. The safe house is attacked, leaving Vance in hospital and Eli missing, with his bodyguard Amit Hadar dead. The movements of all the Palestinians are accounted for at the time of the attack, making it unclear who was responsible, and Ziva suspects her Mossad replacement Liat is hiding something. Drama, starring Michael Nouri, Cote de Pablo, Rocky Carroll and Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy officer scheduled to testify in a forthcoming murder trial goes missing after receiving a threat at the safe house where he was staying, and the deputy district attorney asks the NCIS agents to locate him. One of their few leads is a dead turkey Tony and McGee find in the man's fridge, so they take it to Ducky for an autopsy. Crime drama, starring Sean Murray and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A gas attack occurs at a subway station, and investigations reveal it bears the hallmarks of a previous incident at a church. Briscoe and Curtis are joined by Baltimore detectives Bayliss and Pembleton, who hope to apprehend the prime suspect in both incidents

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a social worker, exposing a racket involving foster children. The resulting trial sees Paul Robinette place the system in the dock as he defends a black woman accused of kidnapping her baby from his adoptive parents. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman murdered while out jogging is found to be the spouse of a comedy club owner previously acquitted of killing his first wife. In order to secure a conviction, the team is forced to trace the part of a Colombian coin used in a subway. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Curtis uncovers evidence of police corruption that puts the DA's office into conflict with an ambitious judge, and Briscoe comes under investigation for stealing evidence from a police lockup. Crime drama, with Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A janitor is found murdered, leading the team to a schizophrenic student they discover has been part of an experimental drug programme. Though all evidence points to the youngster, it transpires that he had no motive to commit the crime and the police soon turn their attentions to a psychiatrist. Sam Waterston stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a crooked car dealer whose son is dying of leukaemia presents McCoy and Ross with a moral dilemma. His ex-wife is their prime suspect - but it transpires that the victim had regularly abused her and refused to pay child support. Drama, starring Sam Waterston

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team attend the funeral of a fallen colleague before resuming their hunt for the man they believe to be the port-to-port killer. Vance frantically researches the suspect's background to learn more about his motivations and discover who his next target could be - but one of the investigators follows a clue that leads to danger

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony tries to piece together the events that led to him lying wounded in a hospital bed, having been shot in the chest through his bulletproof vest. Under the guidance of therapist Dr Rachel Cranston, his memory begins to return and suspicion falls on his ex-lover EJ Barrett. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Sarah Jane Morris

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The investigators examine the death of US marine Tommy Hill, who appears to have been fatally stabbed en route to a homecoming party thrown in his honour by his foster family. McGee and Ziva follow a trail of blood that leads them to a mobile phone, while Abby discovers the victim had been trying to hack into Virginia's state website and Ducky's autopsy reveals that Hill had been injected with a sedative

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: A thief is shot dead while robbing a family at gunpoint, prompting the Reagans to debate how far they would go to protect one another. Meanwhile, a student protest gets out of hand when police officers are assaulted, but Frank faces a dilemma when he discovers the identity of one of those responsible for the violence

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Two children are found handcuffed to their seats but miraculously alive in the back of a van submerged in a river. The ensuing investigation links the case to a mysterious death involving a controversial therapy technique, and eventually leads the team to a seemingly abusive foster family. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler struggle to identify the cause of a woman's death in Central Park, and follow a trail of clues that leads to a mute homeless man, who turns out to be a better witness than anticipated. After they discover a rare toxic agent was the murder weapon, and that the victim was a millionaire, they suspect her husband could be the culprit because his dance troupe had been in financial difficulty. Guest starring Chris Sarandon (ER), with Mariska Harqitay and Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man is accused of murdering two Arab-Americans - but his attorney mounts a novel defence, claiming he was compelled to kill because he is genetically predisposed toward hatred and violence. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson's professional relationship with Stabler comes under increasing pressure as they pursue a serial sex offender who has killed a couple and kidnapped their two children. As the case unfolds, she is attacked by their quarry - and responds by asking to work with another partner in future. Guest starring Lou Diamond Phillips

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A teenager beats a fellow foster home resident to death, and his lawyer seeks a not guilty vedict, claiming the youth is genetically predisposed to violent behaviour because he possesses an extra Y chromosome

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When the body of an elderly woman is found, suspicion turns to her at-home carer and her boyfriend. Evidence quickly begins to suggest the 82-year-old was starved to death, prompting Stone's eye to turn to the victim's granddaughter

programme.desc: The agents investigate the murder of a marine during a cruise. They discover he came from a famous and wealthy family but had turned his back on a life of privilege to join the military, and after the death of his father had inherited a large part of his business. His decision to change his will may have pushed one of his relatives to kill him to keep the firm in their control. Crime drama, guest-starring Diane Neal (Law & Order: Special Victims Unit)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Navy recruitment officer is murdered at a high school and the agents discover he had recently begun a relationship with a married teacher whose wife held a grudge against him. They also find out a student's father was vehemently opposed to his joining the military, and receive help from an unexpected quarter - Ducky's esteemed predecessor, Dr Magnus. Crime drama, guest starring comedian Bob Newhart

Meanwhile, McGee becomes the subject of an embarrassing mix-up when an inflatable doll apparently purchased on his credit card is delivered. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck ad executive becomes a murder suspect when his wife and son are killed during a night he claims to have spent drinking. Ellen Pompeo (Grey's Anatomy) guest stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An attorney is killed shortly after deciding to file a sexual harrassment claim against his employer, and when Briscoe and Curtis investigate further, they discover both the alleged harasser and his wife have excellent motives for murder

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A hard-partying model, with a cocaine habit goes missing, and when the team investigates, a basketball player, a limo driver and a nightclub owner are suspected of orchestrating her disappearance

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The investigation into the murder of Richard Speigel, chief financial officer for an exclusive, family owned department store, results in the arrests of the shop staff - but the manager and father refuses to let his offspring take the blame, and goes all out to get them off the hook. Drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The case against a man accused of shooting the leader of the African-American Congress is jeopardised by the revelation that the prosecution's chief witness was once an informant for the FBI, and is still under their protection

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An angry woman who blames her former daughter-in-law's new husband for her son's death hires a hitman to exact retribution. Briscoe and Curtis manage to get their hands on the contract killer but fail to understand why his customer has gone to such extreme lengths

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: US Navy lieutenant Paul Booth is shot dead while sitting on a park bench. It turns out that the last people he called were his boss, his wife and Penelope Langston - a rebellious academic who also happens to be McGee's grandmother. She says that the victim was an old student of hers who kept in touch, but later reveals she was recruited to work on a special project during the Vietnam War by the head of a top-secret think tank Booth was a member of. Guest starring Lily Tomlin, with Mark Harmon and Sean Murray

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A man who died after being knocked down by a van is revealed to be a professional hitman responsible for at least six contract killings - and his next target was to be a navy lieutenant commander. Abby is delighted at being a match for a teenager who needs a kidney transplant, but she is informed that someone else with very similar DNA has also been identified as suitable. Has she found a relative she never knew about?

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The murder of a coastguard officer on board an abandoned cargo ship draws the team's attention to a family of Lebanese refugees hoping to find a new home in America. Meanwhile, Tony and McGee try to find the perfect woman for Gibbs. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Sean Murray

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The body of a Navy lieutenant is found on the side of a remote road and toxicology tests reveal he died of overhydration. When another man is found dead nearby, the NCIS team begins to suspect a serial killer is on the loose. Meanwhile, Ducky introduces Gibbs to his new girlfriend. Crime drama, guest starring Cheryl Ladd

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A priest asks Stabler to meet a terminally ill man who has a secret he wants to share with his estranged daughter, leading the detective to discover the patient's involvement in a series of unsolved bank robberies during the 1970s. As the investigation progresses, they find a bomb shelter containing millions of dollars and the skeleton of his former partner-in-crime. Guest starring Brian Dennehy and Paget Brewster, with Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman accuses her estranged husband of breaking into her home and raping her. As the man has no history of violence and the victim refuses to allow her daughter to answer questions, the detectives are split over where the truth lies, and Benson is concerned that Stabler's judgement is being clouded by his own divorce. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler is teamed up with a new partner to investigate a sexual assault on a 16-year-old girl who has had her finger severed. Though the newcomer's treatment of teenage suspects causes friction between the two detectives, they focus on discovering the reasons for the assault - and learn that the victim herself was a bully. Anthony Anderson and Natalie Cole guest star alongside Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Tutuola investigate an eight-year-old boy's claims that he has been abused, and discover his family has a turbulent history. The case soon develops into a kidnap mystery, and Benson, enjoying her new job in the computer-crime unit, is drafted in to help resolve matters. With guest star Kate Mulgrew (Star Trek: Voyager)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Logan and Briscoe race to find the kidnapped son of a wealthy businessman who was is arrested while trying to exchange a ransom for the boy, and now threatens to interfere with the investigation

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Logan are approached by a woman who claims she passed out in a taxi and awoke to find her newborn baby missing. Investigating her allegation, they uncover a gang who specialise in kidnapping children to order. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Christopher Noth

programme.desc: In Dorset, Alex Polizzi helps James and Yvonne, the owners of the Coach and Horses. They are struggling to attract business, despite it being the only pub in the village. programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi headss to the Dukes in the Bedfordshire village of Heath and Reach to help mum-of-two Sarah to improve the pub she bought three years ago. After a successful first year, a personal setback turned Sarah's dream into a nightmare. With a knock to her confidence and her eye off the ball, occupancy took a nosedive and the business has bombed. Alex arrives to find Sarah hiding from customers in the kitchen, staff kicking their heels and the place looking more like a youth club than a character country pub

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Berkshire beckons as Alex Polizzi is called to the Grenfell Arms in Maidenhead, a pub with eight bedrooms and a restaurant, all run by 31-year-old Jamie. He cannot find staff, so he is doing all the jobs with the help of his mum, Sandy. She brings a lot of experience and advice to the table, but the two have trouble working harmoniously together, which isn't helping Jamie's business succeed

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi heads to Cornwall to help Sean and Janine, the owners of Northshore, Bude's only hostel. Having returned from travelling the world, the pair bought the property to keep their travelling dream alive. Running the hostel is the best job Sean's ever had - but a shocking downturn in occupancy and their unorthodox living scenario have left Janine wanting out. Desperate to sort the business, the couple call on Alex's advice in a last-ditch attempt to resolve matters. The expert arrives with a few surprises up her sleeve, but quickly learns saving this business isn't going to be easy

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi is enlisted to rescue Michelangelo's, a Newcastle hotel and restaurant owned by Paolo Pieri and operated with the help of his brother, Giacomo. A year ago, illness forced Paolo to step back from the business, bringing a disastrous downturn in customers. Though Paolo is now back, profits are nowhere to be seen, so Alex tries to turn things around

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Joe and Di Lunn relocated to Australia in 1967 to bring up their five children. Now that their youngest daughter has moved back to Yorkshire, they're looking for a holiday home that's within easy reach of her where they can spend up to five months of the year. However, they can't decide on where it should be. Joe wants to return to his Yorkshire roots while Di wants to buy in Normandy France. With a budget of 140,000 Jasmine Harman shows them three fantastic properties in West Yorkshire, while Jonnie Irwin tries to tempt them with three French homes

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away

Jasmine Harman and Jonnie Irwin help with their property search

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The body of Charles Greene, a master diver in the US Navy, washes ashore. The team determines the specialist's body bears signs of a struggle, and a search of the surrounding area brings the agents into contact with former marine Michael Buckley, who had accompanied Greene on his last dive. According to Buckley, the pair's boat was attacked by two people wearing military gear. The case takes a more sinister turn when Homeland Security agent John Russo arrives in town, investigating a report of an imminent threat to New Orleans from a foreign aggressor. Russo's intelligence states a small submarine has been deployed against US interests, and Greene's body bears all the hallmarks of being hit by a similar submersible. Naval crime drama, starring Scott Bakula and Ivan Sergei

programme.desc: In a remote Russian estate, three sisters long to escape their unfulfilling routine and start new lives in Moscow. A brief respite comes in the shape of a charismatic army officer, but their brother's marriage to a domineering peasant woman jeopardises all their hopes for the future. Period drama based on Chekhov's play, with Joan Plowright and Derek Jacobi

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: The return of the documentary following life at Ireland's first purpose-built veterinary clinic that caters exclusively for cats. Nestled in the leafy environs of Glanmire in Co Cork, il is run by veterinary specialist Clare Meade who, together with her dedicated team, offers highly specialised care to the feline clientele

programme.desc: Erich Gottlieb continues to give Harvey the cold shoulder. Period comedy drama, starring Kenneth Cranham, Pauline Quirke and Linda Robson

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London.

programme.title: Sara Dane
programme.desc: Historical drama about a woman transported to a penal colony in Australia for a crime she did not commit

programme.title: Hitler's Bodyguard
programme.desc: How German officers plotted to remove Hitler before the start of the Second World War

programme.title: Killing Dad (1989)
programme.desc: A drunken, out-of-work father writes to the family he abandoned 23 years before to say he wants to come home and ask their forgiveness. His estranged son is so alarmed that he sets off in a bid to kill his unwanted deadbeat dad before he has the chance to show up. Comedy, starring Denholm Elliott, Julie Walters, Richard E Grant and Anna Massey

programme.title: All the Right Noises (1971)
programme.desc: A married man and his younger lover keep secrets from each other - he conceals his family, while she hides the fact that she is only 15. Drama, starring Tom Bell and Judy Carne

programme.title: Triumph of the Spirit (1989)
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about an Auschwitz prisoner who became the concentration camp's boxing champion in a series of fights held for the entertainment of Nazi officers. Starring Willem Dafoe, Robert Loggia and Edward James Olmos

programme.title: Beverley (2015)
programme.desc: A mixed race girl struggles to carve out a sense of identity in the shifting cultural landscape of 1980 Leicester. Short film, starring Sennia Nanua and Vicky McClure

programme.title: News Rewind
programme.desc: A digest of news and events from across London from the past few days.

programme.title: Talking Points
programme.desc: 'Current affairs affecting Londoners today and a look at the latest shows and films in the capital.

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies
programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance

programme.title: Legend of the Dragon
programme.desc: Ang is forced to battle his own self-doubt after he tells Master Chin that Ling would have made a better candidate than himself

programme.title: Dork Hunters from Outer Space
programme.desc: Alien Dorks disguise themselves as humans to use Earth as a base to take over the universe, but they face opposition from some unlikely teenage heroes

programme.title: Extreme Dinosaurs
programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Kong, Jason, jungle girl Lua, fun-loving Tann and wise Dr. Jenkins take on power-hungry scientists, ferocious prehistoric creatures and incredible magical beings to protect their unique island home

programme.title: The Fixers
programme.desc: Four passionate builders in 10 remote locations, have one mission: to improve lives. They will do whatever it takes-saving the world, one build at a time

programme.title: Europe's Wilderness
programme.desc: A journey of discovery, to a wonderful world of breath-taking views and endangered species with each episode focusing on one animal and its lifestyle, needs and habitat

programme.title: Shine On Harvey Moon
programme.desc: Erich Gottlieb continues to give Harvey the cold shoulder. Period comedy drama, starring Kenneth Cranham, Pauline Quirke and Linda Robson

programme.title: Sara Dane
programme.desc: Historical drama about a woman transported to a penal colony in Australia for a crime she did not commit

programme.title: Three Sisters (1970)
programme.desc: In a remote Russian estate, three sisters long to escape their unfulfilling routine and start new lives in Moscow. A brief respite comes in the shape of a charismatic army officer, but their brother's marriage to a domineering peasant woman jeopardises all their hopes for the future. Period drama based on Chekhov's play, with Joan Plowright and Derek Jacobi

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Documentary exploring areas of the capital, beginning with Shooters Hill, Charlton, Greenwich and Blackheath

programme.title: Tabernacle Choir: Music and Words
programme.desc: Music and inspiration for everyday living from one of the world's most acclaimed choirs featuring regular guest artists

programme.title: Wigmore Hall Classical Concerts
programme.desc: Wigmore Hall presents a special broadcast concert from leading brass ensemble Septura, performing works by Ravel, Debussy and Gershwin

programme.title: David Attenborough's Light on Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough embarks on a search for the lights of nature, on a journey that will lead to ocean depths, claustrophobic caves and forests by night

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: Tripitaka and his three disciples Monkey, Pigsy, and Sandy arrive in a land ruled by the evil Golden Horn - who soon has a run-in with a mysterious magician. Masoaki Sakai and Toshiyuki Nishida star

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: Having booked a room in a posh London hotel for a night of passion, William discovers that romance is not as easy as it seems, until Mary makes a seductive suggestion. There's a nasty shock in store for two new parents, and Mary is called to help - leading to serious repercussions at work - while a couple of William's clients have an unusual request for their father's send-off

programme.title: Dickensian
programme.desc: Compeyson is officially courting Miss Havisham and, in order to seem a more credible suitor, he demands money from Arthur, who is forced to sell personal family items to obtain the money. Elsewhere, Honoria is determined to solve her father's debt problems and avoid an arranged marriage with Sir Leicester, while the Bumbles entertain Mr Gradgrind, and the Cratchits worry about Tiny Tim. Starring Stephen Rea, Pauline Collins, Caroline Quentin, Tom Weston-Jones, Tuppence Middleton, Anton Lesser and Omid Djalili

programme.title: Mistresses
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark go on a romantic break to make up after a drunken argument, while Trudi starts to question her future with Richard after discovering the reality of his estranged wife's situation. Katie and Jack spend time together, but things turn sour when he and his wife turn up at Dan's for lunch. Siobhan encourages Hari to open a restaurant so she can quit her job - which she thinks is the perfect way to get their marriage back on track

programme.title: Jack & Sarah (1995)
programme.desc: A lawyer's life is turned upside down by his wife's death in childbirth, leaving him to pick up the pieces and raise their daughter with the help of an unconventional American nanny. This emotional romantic comedy strikes a fair balance between sentiment and slush. Richard E Grant, Samantha Mathis, Judi Dench and Ian McKellen are among the experienced cast

programme.desc: Manchester City v Sunderland. Highlights of the showpiece occasion at Wembley Stadium, where the first major domestic silverware of the 2013/14 season was decided.
